mailjet_create_contact.description:
Create contact (with optional name and exclusion status).

    Add a new contact to your Mailjet account with optional metadata.
    Contacts can be excluded from campaigns at creation time.

    Args:
        params (CreateContactInput): Input containing:
            - email (str): Contact email address
            - name (str, optional): Contact name
            - is_excluded (bool): Whether to exclude from campaigns

    Returns:
        str: Created contact details with ID
